column4: Hello, can anyone help me out? I'm using an Acer Aspire 5585WXMi laptop. The Intel Wireless Driver iwl3945 seems to be loaded, but "disabled" ? When I press the witch to turn on Wifi on the laptop nothing happens.
yes wireless can be a right issue with Linux
since the propritary hardware companies that carn't be bothered to suppourt there wireless devices with it
well 8.04 will have a newer kernel
